name: placeholder finder
content:
(<placeholder)((?:(?:\s*)([\w]{0,})(=)(")([\w]{0,})("))*?)(?:\s*)(>)(?:\s*)(<\/placeholder(?:\s*)>)?

(<placeholder)((?:(?:\s*)([\w]{0,})(=)(")([\w]{0,})("))*?)(?:\s*)(>)(?:\n*)((?:((<[\w-+]{0,}>)([\w]{0,})(<\/[\w-+]{0,}>))(?:\n*))*)(?:\s*)(<\/placeholder(?:\s*)>)?

<placeholder type="test" name="test1" field="test"></placeholder>
<placeholder type="test" name="test" ></placeholder>
<placeholder> </placeholder>
<placeholder></placeholder>
<placeholder name="something" type="something else" value="hi1">
<config name="test">asdfa</config>
<config name="test1">assadf</config>
<config name="test2">asdfasdf</config>
</placeholder>
<placeholder type ></placeholder>
<placeholder type= ></placeholder>
<placeholder type= name= ></placeholder>
<placeholder type="" ></placeholder>
<placeholder type="" name="" ></placeholder>
<placeholder type="asfas" ></placeholder>
<placeholder type="asdfasf" name="asdfsd" ></placeholder>
<placeholder      >    </placeholder   >
<placeholder type="asfasf+asdfsa"/>
(=)([\w]{0,})
(?:(([\w-+*@~#]{0,}=""[\w-+\s*@~#;:./\?<>,']{0,}""))+)?

abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
author: mudasar
